Type Encoders

List of implemented type_encoder classes, submodule of EntityTypingNetwork

class entity_typing_framework.EntityTypingNetwork_classes.type_encoders.OneHotTypeEncoder(name, **kwargs)

since the DatasetManager commonly represents true labels as one hot, this is a dummy module, only returns the already correct labels

parameters:
name:

the name of the submodule, has to be specified in the yaml configuration file with key model.ET_Network_params.type_encoder_params.name

to instance this type encoder insert the string OneHotTypeEncoder in the yaml configuration file with key model.ET_Network_params.type_encoder_params.name

this param is used by the Entity Typing Network to instance the correct submodule

forward(batched_labels)

defines the forward pass of the type encoder. In the forwar the batched_labels is returned as is since this is a dummy module

Parameters:
batched_labels:

one of the batch elements returned by the dataset (__getitem__ method). It contains one hot labels extracted from Dataset Tokenizer

the expected format of the one hot labels is a vector [label_number] with values 1 for each True label, 0 for each False label based on the type2id dictionary into the Dataset Manager
